entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
